net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_RollExpression_addTypedDescriptor
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
This will add a descriptor object to a roll expression.
A descriptor is an object which has a type and some text that
can be used in the output. There are a list of these objects
stored on a roll expression
arg(0) = roll expression
arg(1) = descriptor type; That valid field names are below
condition
Text was added by checking for a condition when rolling an attack
tooltipRoll
The roll expression used in a tooltip
tooltipDetail
The individual die rolls and bonus for the tool tip roll.
advantageable
Details on advantage/disadvantage snd the cancelling of both
lucky
A die was rerolled for a lucky halfling
critable
There was a critical roll
saveable
There is damge that can be saved
arg(2) = descriptor text
